help-file.title: FIGHTER
help-file.content:
The Fighter, as the name suggests, is a class that involves hand-to-hand combat most extensively. They are usually the first to charge into battle and are almost always the ones that stand at the head of a fighting group ("acting as tank," it is commonly called). They sustain most of the battle damage.
Fighters represent a group of classes into which Berserkers, Warriors, Rangers, Reavers, Paladins, Anti-Paladins, Monks and Dreadlords are grouped. Each sub-class has its own experience chart according to which they gain levels.
NOTE: Use "help <classname>" for information on each of the sub-classes.
